about_the_game:
"Am I beautiful? What does it mean to be beautiful?"

Story 

A mysterious package arrives at your door, the contents inside shock you beyond belief. The Android woman inside reveals herself to be known as Float, and she desires to know more about what it means to be human. You cautiously accept her request and begin your new life with her.

Gameplay

In this kinetic visual novel, you play the role as Float's teacher, you'll go on many different adventures as you teach Float more about the human world, teach her about the nuances of conversations as you go grocery shopping, or understand what it means to be truly beautiful as you shop for new clothes, you have a lot of work cut out for you as you watch this adventure unfold.

Features

  • Breathtaking artwork with many unique, jaw-dropping CG's

  • Engaging, engrossing and emotional storyline told in a visual novel format

  • Features a cute android girl! 

  • Kinetic visual novel, relax and watch the story unfold!

  • Atmospheric and immersive soundtrack!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains profanity, strong language and revealing outfits

name: Your Android

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Your life is changed forever when a mysterious package arrives at your front door. Go on many different outings with your new android companion as you both form unforgettable memories in this beautiful visual novel.
